title: Research Scientist (L4/5) - Globalization - Multimodal LLM
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
• Research and develop Multimodal LLMs and Computer Vision algorithms  
• Collaborate with ML scientists and engineers on business applications  
• Identify new research opportunities with significant business impact  

**REQUIREMENTS:**
• Proven research track record in Multimodal LLMs and Computer Vision  
• MS or PhD in ML, Computer Science, or related fields  
• Exceptional communication and collaboration skills  

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
• PyTorch  
• TensorFlow  
• Machine Learning and Deep Learning frameworks

title: Machine Learning Engineer 5 - Ads
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
- Develop scalable machine learning models for ad personalization.
- Collaborate with researchers to integrate models into production.
- Enhance ML model performance for increasing ad demand.
- Design advanced models for ad ranking and personalization.
- Drive business impact through innovative advertising solutions.
- Collaborate across disciplines to meet technical and business needs.
- Champion user experience while balancing advertiser goals.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- Proficiency in Java, Python, or Scala.
- Experience with end-to-end ML model deployment.
- Familiarity with DevOps tools and practices.
- Strong problem-solving and collaboration skills.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Machine learning frameworks and tools.
- Real-time systems and data processing technologies.
- Ad tech and optimization algorithms.

title: Product Manager, Machine Learning Architecture (Ads Platform)
description:
**RESPONSIBILITIES:**
• Define and own product vision for shared ML architecture.  
• Deliver APIs, SDKs, and UI for product teams.  
• Establish governance and privacy standards with Legal and Privacy teams.  
• Partner with Experience Design to improve workflows and reduce task time.  
• Integrate third-party applications with Netflix Ad Suite.  
• Track success metrics and iterate based on feedback.  

**REQUIREMENTS:**
• 10+ years of Product Management experience.  
• Proven track record in foundational tech infrastructures.  
• Strong visionary leadership and roadmap development skills.  
• Deep understanding of advertising and machine learning technologies.  
• Experience with cross-functional team collaboration.  
• Familiarity with data privacy regulations.  

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
• Machine Learning infrastructure.  
• APIs and SDKs for product integration.  
• Advertising technology components.

**REQUIREMENTS:**
- 7+ years of Product Management experience.
- Proven success in scaling technical products.
- Strong understanding of data modeling and governance.
- Excellent communication and relationship-building skills.
- High AI literacy and experience with AI products.

**KEY TECHNOLOGIES:**
- Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) systems.
- Data management and governance tools.
- AI-enabled product solutions.
